Russian Foreign Minister to Visit DPRK 
    Pyongyang, June 23 (KCNA) -- Sergei Viktorovich Lavrov, foreign minister of Russia, will visit the DPRK in the near future at the invitation of Paek Nam Sun, foreign minister of the DPRK.

Surprise Protest of S. Korean Students 
    Pyongyang, June 23 (KCNA) -- University students under the south Korean Federation of University Student Councils staged a surprise protest on June 19 in front of the building of the Uri Party, which had decided to force troop dispatch to Iraq, according to MBC of south Korea.
 In a statement they denounced the party which had adopted the dispatch of troops to Iraq as "the party's opinion" and demanded the party immediately withdraw the opinion that is different from the will of the people.

S. Korean Visiting Group Here
    Pyongyang, June 23 (KCNA) -- A visiting group of "Good Neighbors" of south Korea led by Chairman Ri Il Ha arrived here Wednesday.
 It was greeted at the airport by Kim Song Il, vice-chairman of the National Reconciliation Council, and officials concerned with compatriotic feelings.
